title: How to Download Files on Box

steps.title: Log in to your Box account and click on the file that you want under where it says "Files and Folders."
steps.content: Log in to your Box account and click on the file that you want under where it says "Files and Folders."

steps.title: Wait for the file to load, and then click the "Download" button with the blue down arrow icon in the top right corner of the browser window.
steps.content: Wait for the file to load, and then click the "Download" button with the blue down arrow icon in the top right corner of the browser window.

steps.title: Give the file you want to download a name when the browsing window appears, and then click "Save" to save the file to your computer.
steps.content: Give the file you want to download a name when the browsing window appears, and then click "Save" to save the file to your computer.

steps.title: Click on the file in the bottom left corner of the browser to open it if you want to use it right away after it finishes downloading.
steps.content: Click on the file in the bottom left corner of the browser to open it if you want to use it right away after it finishes downloading.
